amendment.description: Amendment strikes out all after the enacting clause and inserts a new text titled "Negro Leagues Baseball Centennial Commemorative Coin Act".
amendment.purpose: Amendment strikes out all after the enacting clause and inserts a new text titled "Negro Leagues Baseball Centennial Commemorative Coin Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cleaver amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Cleaver.
